summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eyebrow Stencils & Eyebrow Pencil, 10 Styles of Eyebrow Shaper, Reusable Eyebrow Template with Dark Brown Dual-Ended Pencil & Eyebrow Razor, 3 Minutes Makeup, Suitable For All Face Shape
Review Date: 2022/04/26
Store: VIAMAZ
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'VIAMAZ', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Reusable', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable, Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 1.97 x 0.75 inches; 1.13 Ounces'}
Review Text: I don't wear makeup often, and since this was something new to me I wanted to try it out. I like the variety of stencils included. It was easy to position and hold one in place. The problem was with the pencil...every time you try to color your eyebrow, the tip just rolls back into the tube after each pass over, making it annoying to have to keep holding the stencil with one hand while constantly twisting the color back out of the applicator with the other! Will probably end up giving these to my daughter, she has more patience than I do!
Review Title: Not bad, but not great either!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Cell Fusion C Low pH pHarrier Mask*10sheets | Intensive weak acid care for all skin types, Korean Face Mask
Review Date: 2022/05/15
Store: Cell Fusion C
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Weight': '200 Grams', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.36 x 2.36 x 3.94 inches', 'Brand': 'Cell Fusion C', 'Item Volume': '250 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 3.94 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RLE22305'}
Review Text: This is one of the best masks I've used in a while! It was slightly bigger than some, but you can easily fold over to fit. Holes for eyes and mouth were perfect size, and fits well over the nose! No unpleasant fragrance and lots of essence. The best part is that it doesn't leave your skin feeling even 1% sticky after taking it off! Great quantity for the price as well...definitely recommend!
Review Title: One of the best!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VOFEL Jelly Masks for Facials Mask Powder for Moisturizing Anti Aging Jelly Face Mask Peel Off 9 Pcs
Review Date: 2022/06/24
Store: VOFEL
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'VOFEL', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Vanilla,Lemon', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 3.46 x 1.46 inches; 5.86 Ounces', 'UPC': '770456407264'}
Review Text: This was not my first time using a jelly mask and I followed mixing instructions as usual, so I have no clue why the mask ended up as it did. I put everything that was in the bowl onto my face...was going to wait the minimum 20 minutes before removing, however, the mask was already a dried, powdery clay-looking mess before the time was up. There was no peeling off, and I was barely able to rinse it off...was very hard, and looked like I was taking paint chips off my face! I used the lemon mask, which was the only one that was a whitening mask...I wonder though, since it definitely isn't going to whiten after just one mask, do I have to keep buying this set just to get the lemon one? Doesn't seem worth it. On the bright side, it did make my face feel soft after the irritation and annoyance of removing the mask...but, I can get the same results elsewhere, so definitely won't order again!
Review Title: Very disappointed
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: By Terry Hyaluronic Pressed Hydra-Powder | Transcluscent | Infused with Hyaluronic Acid | Vegan
Review Date: 2022/07/01
Store: By Terry
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'By Terry', 'Item Form': 'powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '3.19 x 3.15 x 0.75 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3700076457087'}
Review Text: Nice mirrored compact with a basic powder puff. Does look white on your skin for awhile...definitely matte, and very smooth...however, makes my dry spots look more dry. Not everyone will have the same issue, but I won't be using it often!
Review Title: Not for me
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party)
Review Date: 2022/07/08
Store: YouClean
Product Description: ['Brand:', 'YouClean', 'Item Form:', 'Sheet', 'Formulation:', 'Concentrated plant-based soap', 'Scent:', 'Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)', 'Package Box Size:', '2 x 1 x 1.5 inch', 'www.shopyouclean.com', "We are changing our packaging. No more small plastic cases!   Our new packaging is 100% biodegradable paper. All 300 sheets are tightly packed in 3 tiny paper boxes (100 sheets/box) which nicely fit in any purse/wallet, handbag, and kids' pack-backs.   Check out our 9 scent collections:   - Tea Party  - Citrus Collection  - Purple Heart  - Pink Pamper  - Red Passion  - Blanca Elegance  - Seaside Vacation  - The Adventure  - The Nonsense (unscented)"]
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'YouClean', 'Scent': 'Tea Party', 'Material Type Free': 'Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)  See more', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '609670421100', 'Manufacturer': 'YouClean'}
Review Text: Advertises 8 packs, you get 4....advertises 8 scents, you get 2 (3 packs all have the same scent). The product page states they are paraben-free, bleach-free, etc., however, no where on the page or any of the packages is there a list of ingredients. I'm still debating on whether or not I actually want to use them! However, as of right now, I do not recommend.
Review Title: Not as advertised
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vitamasques Cica Green Tea Jelly Facial Cleanser Gentle pH Cleanser is Refreshing, Cleansing & Exfoliating for Smooth, Clean & Radiant Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
Review Date: 2022/07/21
Store: Vitamasques
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.81 x 1.38 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258969917'}
Review Text: I've liked all the Vitamasques products I've used so far, and this cleanser is added to that list! I was afraid that it would have a medicinal smell since the ingredients include Centella Asiatica, however I was surprised when I opened the tube and was hit with a fragrance that, to me, smells like fresh cut grass! Has a gel-like texture with added bits of what look like tea leaves. It doesn't lather much, but is more like a cream when you start to massage it over your skin. Very gentle, rinses without leaving any residue, and your skin will feel extra soft!
Review Title: Great Vitamasques cleanser!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MRTREUP Chrome Nail Powder Palette , Metallic Mirror Effect Chrome Powder for Nails , Rose Gold Sliver Pink Holographic Nail Glitter Nail Pigment Powder for DIY Salon Nail Art Decorations
Review Date: 2022/08/01
Store: MRTREUP
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.05 x 0.55 inches; 1.76 Ounces'}
Review Text: Love this metallic nail powder! Nice colors, comes with 2 eyeshadow sticks, and very easy to use. Gives instructions for 2 types of applications: one on the back of the outer package and the other on the back of the palette. Both turn out really well! Great price...definitely recommend.
Review Title: Awesome nail powder!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pineapple Gommage Peeling Gel by Vitamasques - Gentle Botanical Cellulose Exfoliator for Sensitive Skin - De-Clogs Pores & Eliminates Dead Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
Review Date: 2022/08/07
Store: Vitamasques
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Package Dimensions': '4.92 x 2.2 x 1.38 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258970371'}
Review Text: This is a nice peeling gel...very subtle pineapple fragrance and not greasy. This is like other peels that state they remove dead skin cells, however, at least this brand isn't trying to make you believe that the particles you see after massaging onto the skin are those cells, because they're not! You will see a small amount of particles or a lot, depending on how much you use, and it is only the product...that's how they work, the gel turns into an exfoliator! I've never had any of these peels, including this one, really clean the pores...however, it does leave the skin feeling soft and refreshed. I did take away 1 star because the tube seems to not contain much gel, as compared to other Vitamasques products. Overall, not a bad product for the price.
Review Title: Good exfoliator
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 4240Pcs Flatback White Opal Rhinestones Glass Crystal Gemstones for Nail Art Face Makeup Glitter Round with Tweezers and Picking Pen (SS6~SS20 Set)
Review Date: 2022/08/17
Store: MEIBITE
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MEIBITE', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Item Form': 'Pen', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Crafts, Nail Arts, Arts', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4.33 x 0.59 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '749666774886'}
Review Text: These are nice rhinestones, but I only gave 3 stars for having to spend so much time cleaning up the mess of the lid being popped up in the package. You do get a variety of sizes and an abundance of each size. Easy to apply and look nice on nails. Price is a bit steep for the product, and for the hassle of putting them all back in the container! Won't order again.
Review Title: Love the opal rhinestones, but...
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: essence | Welcome to Miami Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Blendable Shades | Matte & Metallic | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Made Without Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles
Review Date: 2022/09/03
Store: essence cosmetics
Product Description: ["¡BIENVENIDOS A MIAMI! With the essence welcome to MIAMI eyeshadow palette, we're bringing the sunny vibes of Florida into our make-up bags. The bright and bold color palette is inspired by the iconic Miami beaches and art deco landmarks. The 12 highly-pigmented are sure to create a feeling of happiness with their nude, pink, violet, turquoise and green shades. Thanks to the diverse finishes ranging from matte to metallic, you can create countless looks for any occasion. This product is vegan & cruelty free and is formulated without oil, fragrance, parabens, alcohol, & microplastic particles."]
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'essence cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals, Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Fragrance Free, Oil Free, Alcohol Free, Microplastic Particle Free, Paraben Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6.73 x 2.52 x 0.47 inches; 3.25 Ounces', 'Item model number': '934930', 'Manufacturer': 'essence cosmetics', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
Review Text: Nice eyeshadow palette. Vibrant colors with good pigment, can actually see the color when applied! I did take off 1 star because one color was broken up when I got it and now it's just making a mess on the whole palette! Doesn't come with an eyeshadow brush, but overall nice quality and a good price.
Review Title: Nice colors!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CELLEANSER Vegan Clean Cream 100% Vegan Ingredients Hydrating Nourishing Anti-Aging Balancing Panthenol Silky Made in Korea 60ml 2.02 fl.oz.
Review Date: 2022/09/14
Store: Celleanser
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Celleanser', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '2.02 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 1.65 x 1.65 inches; 2.89 Ounces'}
Review Text: This Celleanser clean cream is good, but nothing spectacular. Has a medicinal fragrance that fades quickly. Doesn't leave your skin feeling heavy or greasy and absorbs quickly, but not much hydration! I usually follow about 30 minutes after applying with the Celleanser Therapy Water Bounce Cream for better results. Reasonably priced, and good for when you're on a budget.
Review Title: It's okay
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Celleanser Vegan Clean Serum100% Vegan Ingredients Quick Relief and Repair Hypoallergic Tested Hydrating Panthenol Silky Texture Made in Korea 30ml 1.01 fl. oz.
Review Date: 2022/09/14
Store: Celleanser
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.83 x 1.26 x 1.26 inches; 2.89 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is a nice pump serum, which I like better than those that use a dropper. Has a thick, milky texture and subtle medicinal scent that doesn't last long. Absorbs quickly and doesn't leave your skin feeling sticky, however, not much in the way of hydration until you add a cream! Like the other Celleanser products, ingredients listed in English on the box (if you open box by using the perforation, you'll see the ingredients and brand story inside, all written in Korean. It's reasonably priced, which is nice for those of us on a budget!
Review Title: It's good
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Details: {'Brand': 'VOFEL', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Vanilla,Lemon', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 3.46 x 1.46 inches; 5.86 Ounces', 'UPC': '770456407264'}
Review Text: This was not my first time using a jelly mask and I followed mixing instructions as usual, so I have no clue why the mask ended up as it did. I put everything that was in the bowl onto my face...was going to wait the minimum 20 minutes before removing, however, the mask was already a dried, powdery clay-looking mess before the time was up. There was no peeling off, and I was barely able to rinse it off...was very hard, and looked like I was taking paint chips off my face! I used the lemon mask, which was the only one that was a whitening mask...I wonder though, since it definitely isn't going to whiten after just one mask, do I have to keep buying this set just to get the lemon one? Doesn't seem worth it. On the bright side, it did make my face feel soft after the irritation and annoyance of removing the mask...but, I can get the same results elsewhere, so definitely won't order again!
Review Title: Very disappointed
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Title: Vitamasques Cica Green Tea Jelly Facial Cleanser Gentle pH Cleanser is Refreshing, Cleansing & Exfoliating for Smooth, Clean & Radiant Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
Review Date: 2022/07/21
Store: Vitamasques
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.81 x 1.38 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258969917'}
Review Text: I've liked all the Vitamasques products I've used so far, and this cleanser is added to that list! I was afraid that it would have a medicinal smell since the ingredients include Centella Asiatica, however I was surprised when I opened the tube and was hit with a fragrance that, to me, smells like fresh cut grass! Has a gel-like texture with added bits of what look like tea leaves. It doesn't lather much, but is more like a cream when you start to massage it over your skin. Very gentle, rinses without leaving any residue, and your skin will feel extra soft!
Review Title: Great Vitamasques cleanser!

Product Title: Pineapple Gommage Peeling Gel by Vitamasques - Gentle Botanical Cellulose Exfoliator for Sensitive Skin - De-Clogs Pores & Eliminates Dead Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
Review Date: 2022/08/07
Store: Vitamasques
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Package Dimensions': '4.92 x 2.2 x 1.38 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258970371'}
Review Text: This is a nice peeling gel...very subtle pineapple fragrance and not greasy. This is like other peels that state they remove dead skin cells, however, at least this brand isn't trying to make you believe that the particles you see after massaging onto the skin are those cells, because they're not! You will see a small amount of particles or a lot, depending on how much you use, and it is only the product...that's how they work, the gel turns into an exfoliator! I've never had any of these peels, including this one, really clean the pores...however, it does leave the skin feeling soft and refreshed. I did take away 1 star because the tube seems to not contain much gel, as compared to other Vitamasques products. Overall, not a bad product for the price.
Review Title: Good exfoliator
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: This is a nice pump serum, which I like better than those that use a dropper. Has a thick, milky texture and subtle medicinal scent that doesn't last long. Absorbs quickly and doesn't leave your skin feeling sticky, however, not much in the way of hydration until you add a cream! It's reasonably priced, which is nice for those of us on a budget!

raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences Summary:**

- **Skincare Products**: The individual shows a strong preference for skincare items, particularly facial masks and cleansers, with several high ratings for gentle and hydrating products. They are drawn to vegan and cruelty-free options.

- **Makeup Items**: Interest in makeup, especially multifunctional products like eyeliners and eyeshadow palettes, is evident. They prefer cruelty-free cosmetics but express mixed feelings towards application ease and product performance.

- **User-Friendliness**: Products that are easy to use and have straightforward application processes are favored, while difficulties with application lead to dissatisfaction.

- **Natural and Gentle Ingredients**: The buyer often seeks products that are free from harsh chemicals, opting for items labeled vegan, paraben-free, and skin-friendly. 

- **Value for Money**: There is a sensitivity to pricing, favoring products offering good quality at reasonable prices. They frequently express disappointment when products do not meet expectations based on advertising.

- **Packaging Concerns**: Issues with package integrity and product usability have been noted, indicating a preference for reliable and clean packaging.

- **Occasional Frustration**: Experiences of disappointment, especially with product performance or unfulfilled expectations, reflect a level of skepticism and caution in future purchases.

Overall, the shopper leans towards eco-friendly and user-friendly skincare and makeup products, with an emphasis on value and effective performance.

target_interaction.title: Don't use right before going to bed
target_interaction.text: This is a good mask for anytime your skin needs hydrating, however, I would suggest not applying it right before going to bed as it doesn't absorb quickly and stays sticky for a couple of hours. Nice cool gel that feels creamy when massaged onto the skin...and has a sweet fragrance that, to me, smells like a mix of vanilla and coconut! I like products that come in a clear tube so you can see exactly how much you're getting, and this one is definitely worth the price! Do recommend.
target_interaction.title_meta: Vitamasques Multivitamin Sleeping Mask Made with Essential Vitamins & Multi-Molecular Hyaluronic Acid for Healthy, Nourished & Hydrated Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
